Title: reanimated Monster Mash-Up
Description:
[quote]Before you stood a bare, new life. History’s fuzzy wave has washed away the amniotic waters of creation, unnamed. Yet, as the Beetle Moon nears its zenith, you feel a familiar force calling out to you from the Zero Hour. As its puppet-strings wrap around your wrists, you wonder: Who has the right to name another a monster?[/quote]

Compilation mod pack for the [url=https://itch.io/jam/caves-of-qud-modding-jam-4]Caves of Qud Mod Jam: reanimated Monster Mash[/url], which ran at the start of November 2025. See all the entries [url=https://itch.io/jam/caves-of-qud-modding-jam-4/entries]here[/url]!

A gigantic engraved thanks with suspensors to all who participated! 
— The mod jam organizers

While playing, use the in-game wish menu for easy access to the pack's contents (Debug > Wish Menu, bound to shift-W by default) or by wishing 'reanimatedmonstermashwishmenu' (this can be bound to its own key under Debug > reanimated Monster Mash-Up Wish Menu).

[b]A note on balance:[/b] using all of these mods will likely result an extremely chaotic Caves of Qud run.

This version of the pack is for the 1.0.4 release (build 210.X) of Caves of Qud.

[b]Warning:[/b] Do not run this pack simultaneous with any of the mods contained within.

[url=https://itch.io/jam/caves-of-qud-modding-jam-4]Mod jam page (itch)[/url] | [url=https://itch.io/jam/caves-of-qud-modding-jam-4/entries]Mod jam entries (itch)[/url] | [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3605340943]Submissions collection (Steam)[/url] | [url=https://github.com/TrashMonks/caves-of-qud-mod-jam-2025-reanimated-monster-mash]Source Code (GitHub)[/url]

[quote]You imbued a hideous specimen with life, again. Why?[/quote]
